title: 18. Cephie Studios Bot Specific Terms
content: The following terms apply specifically to the Cephie Studios Discord Bot in addition to all previous terms:

subsections.title: Flight Log Management
subsections.content: The Cephie Studios Bot facilitates flight log submission and management for virtual airlines. Users are responsible for the accuracy of all flight data submitted through the bot. Flight logs must represent actual simulated flights and comply with realistic aviation procedures.

subsections.title: Misuse of Flight Logs and Bot Commands
subsections.content: The creation of intentionally false or non-compliant flight logs, as well as the misuse of bot commands, may result in permanent exclusion from our Services and partnerships. Failure to report such actions is treated equally and may lead to a global ban from Cephie Studios and its partner services.

subsections.title: Refusal to Delete Invalid Logs
subsections.content: If a user or server owner refuses to delete an invalid flight log, they may be subject to exclusion from our Services. This includes removal of bot access for the respective server. If a server owner denies such a request and no involved party reports the issue, all participants may be held accountable.

subsections.title: Leaderboard Manipulation
subsections.content: Manipulation of leaderboards or any statistics by submitting false or non-compliant flight logs, especially by server owners or staff members,can result in the full removal of Cephie Studios Services from that server and a global exclusion of those involved.

subsections.title: Server Integration Requirements
subsections.content: Discord servers using the Cephie Studios Bot must maintain appropriate moderation and comply with our community standards. Server owners are responsible for educating their members about proper bot usage and reporting violations to Cephie Studios staff.

subsections.title: Bot Permissions and Access
subsections.content: The Cephie Studios Bot requires specific Discord permissions to function properly. Users and server administrators must not attempt to restrict these permissions in ways that compromise bot functionality. We reserve the right to discontinue service to servers that do not maintain proper bot permissions.

title: 19. Cephie Studios API Specific Terms
content: The following terms apply specifically to the Cephie Studios API in addition to all previous terms. Violation of any API terms will result in immediate and permanent suspension of API access:

subsections.title: API Access Requirements
subsections.content: Access to the Cephie Studios API requires a valid API key. You must never share your API key with unauthorized parties. API keys are tied to specific users and/or applications, and any misuse will result in permanent revocation of access and possible legal action.

subsections.title: Rate Limiting
subsections.content: All API endpoints are strictly rate limited. Exceeding these limits will result in immediate suspension of your API key. The current rate limits are: 60 requests per minute per API key. We do not tolerate attempts to circumvent these limits.

subsections.title: Data Access and Scope
subsections.content: The Cephie Studios API provides access to different types of data depending on your authorization level: (1) Server-specific data: Flight logs and guild data for servers you have authorized access to; (2) Cross-server data: Certain approved projects and partnerships may have access to flight data and guild data from all servers using Cephie Studios services; (3) By using Cephie Studios services on your server, you acknowledge that approved third-party projects may access your server's flight logs and configuration data through the API.

subsections.title: Data Usage Restrictions
subsections.content: Data obtained through the Cephie Studios API may only be used for the intended purpose of virtual airline management and approved integrations. Any scraping, unauthorized storage, or redistribution of API data will lead to permanent banning from all Cephie Studios services.

subsections.title: Third-Party Project Access
subsections.content: Some approved third-party projects and services may have elevated API access that includes access to flight data and guild configuration data from all servers. By using Cephie Studios services, you consent to this data sharing with approved projects for the purpose of enhancing the virtual aviation community.

subsections.title: Zero Tolerance Policy
subsections.content: Cephie Studios maintains a zero tolerance policy for API abuse. There are no warnings - violations will result in immediate, permanent termination of access to all Cephie Studios services, and we will pursue all available legal remedies against offenders.
